content.html: dont understand why any content creator would publish natively on twitter, rather than give tidbits that end with a "read more" link or something. you're much better off driving traffic to a site you control. earn your own ad revenue, control your own content, etc. twitter.com/elonmusk/statu…
content.value: dont understand why any content creator would publish natively on twitter, rather than give tidbits that end with a "read more" link or something. you're much better off driving traffic to a site you control. earn your own ad revenue, control your own content, etc.
